MBition | Software Engineers | Berlin, Germany | ONSITE | mbition.io

MBition is a 100% subsidiary of Daimler AG (Mercedes-Benz) and is located in Berlin. We combine the spirit and the flexibility of a start-up with the resources and capabilities of a global active premium car manufacturing company. MBition concentrates on the series development of infotainment platforms, navigation software, location-based services and user experience / user interface.

We are currently searching for a lot of software developers in the area of in-vehicle infotainment software, including but not only Linux Kernel and device driver developers, base platform developers, and application developers.

Most of us develop in C/C++ with standard tools like Gitlab and Jenkins. As far as I can judge we offer above-average salary, good work-life-balance and a quite comfortable environment.

http://jobs.daimler.com/job/149561/software-engineer-infotai...
